name: @ranchonyx/ini-parser
description: A simple, relatively lightweight ini parser

scripts.clean:win: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') process.exit(1)" || , if exist dist del dist\* /S /Q
scripts.clean: npm run clean:win && npm run clean:lin
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.commit: npm run build && git add . && powershell -Command "git commit -m 'BUILD: $(Get-Date)'"

author: Felix Janetzki
